title: Path To Origin (Part 6)
body:
Path To Origin (Part 6)

---) Body Empowerment (Authority): Upon activation, increases the user's strength and physical defence by 400% for the next thirty seconds. During the effective period of the Authority, the user's spiritual defence will be decreased by 50%. This authority can be used once every fifteen days.

The moment Moloch activated his authority, a terrifying aura burst outward from his body, and all the beginner Level Rank One shadow undeads who were standing near him were torn to shreds just by the sheer amount of pressure that came out of his body.

After activating his authority, Moloch ignored the shadow undeads and looked at Evan, who was at the opposite end of the Shadow World.

When Moloch looked at him, all the hair on Evan's body stood on end, and he immediately used the teleportation power of the Shadow World to shift his position.
